name: Construction Reserve Fund
objective: To promote the construction, reconstruction, reconditioning, or acquisition of merchant vessels built and documented under the laws of the United States for purposes of national defense and the development of U.S. commerce.

results.description: In 2016 over 20 vessels were constructed with funds deposited into CRFs. In 2016 over 30 vessels were constructed with funds deposited into CRFs.

Two Construction Reserve Fund (CRF) Fundholders sold a total of {Nine} vessels from their fleet as of September 30, 2024. 
While taking advantage of the accumulation tax depreciation all net proceeds from vessel sales were used for New Builds.

authorizations.text: 511, Merchant Marine Act of 1936. Pub. L. 74, 835. 46 U.S.C. § 1161.

rules_regulations: 46 CFR Part 287; Order and Form of Resolution which outlines details pertaining to the establishment and maintenance of the Construction Reserve Fund.
